FuncDef: The display system tcam fail-record command displays TCAM delivery failures. The display system tcam fail-record command displays TCAM delivery failures.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: When services fail to be delivered, the TCAM resource management module records delivery failures, including modules that deliver services, delivery time, and cause. You can run this command to view the causes of TCAM delivery failures.
